column2: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -xe
', u'yum update -y aws-cfn-bootstrap
', u"echo 'export JAVA_HOME=/etc/alternatives/java_sdk' >> /home/ec2-user/.bash_profile
", u"echo 'export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin' >> /home/ec2-user/.bash_profile
", u'# Install the files and packages from the metadata
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -v ', u'         --stack ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackName'}, u'         --resource ZeppelinInstance ', u'         --configsets InstallAndRun ', u'         --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'
', u'# Signal the status from cfn-init
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e $? ', u'         --stack ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackName'}, u'         --resource ZeppelinInstance ', u'         --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'
']]}}
